Statute.Title: Petro-Canada Public Participation Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Participation publique au capital de Petro-Canada, Loi sur la)

Minister.Text: Minister of Finance (SI/93‑174); Minister of Finance (ss. 14(2) and 21(1)) (SI/91‑112)

CIF.Text: CIF, 1991, c. 10 in force on assent 01.02.91 except ss. 14(1), 15, 17 and 20

Item.Text: — ss. 14(1), 15 and 20, in relation to all items of the schedule other than item 4, in force 05.02.2001 see SI/2001‑17
— ss. 18(1) and item 4 of the schedule, as enacted by s. 20, repealed before coming into force 31.12.2011 see 2008, c. 20, s. 3

CIF.Text: CIF, 1993, c. 34, s. 101 in force on assent 23.06.93
CIF, 1994, c. 24, s. 34 in force on assent 23.06.94
CIF, 1994, c. 47, s. 220 (Sch. IV, item 2) in force 01.01.95 see SI/95‑5
CIF, 2001, c. 18, s. 2 in force on assent 14.06.2001
